charges.charge_description: 18:924(c)(1)(A)and 18:2 A/A, POSSESSION OF A FIREARM IN FURTHERANCE OF A DRUG TRAFFICKING CRIME(2)

charges.charge_disposition: IMPR: Ninety-Six (96)Months to be served consecutively with Eighty-Seven (87) Months in CR-15-693(DRD)for a total term of 183 months; SRT: Five (5) Years to be served concurrently with Four (4) Years in CR-15-693 (DRD); SMA: $100.00; FORFEITURE: Pursuant to Plea Agreement
